customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"If that's the case... Well then, Dehya's friends, I shall accompany you for a round."
Asfand opens his Casket of Tomes to reveal a deck in which "Jadeplume Terrorshroom," "Yoimiya," and "Xingqiu" are the core characters.
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When the battle begins, all characters on both sides gain 1 Energy.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Fungostro Cresta di giada
customize.desc:
"Lord of Fungi" Jadeplume Terrorshroom

If you keep silent and listen closely, you can here the sound of the ruler of the Shroom-Kin inspecting its territory…

customize.name: Yoimiya
customize.desc:
Yoimiya: Euforia di fuochi

Capitana e Schermagliatrice della squadra Naganohara per l'11º torneo amichevole su invito di Hanamizaka!

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc:
Xingqiu, Giovane paladino

"È una mia impressione o i protagonisti dei romanzi di oggi sono tutti studenti di una scuola privata o simili?"

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
